article_text: “As I heard from Victor, Mark, Valerie and Becky in Kansas City, there is more work to be done,“ President Barack Obama writes. “Folks across the country tell me that if Congress just had the same priorities that ordinary Americans did, we could help a lot more families right now.”

article_metadata.news-keywords: obama, kansas city, parkville, speech, economy, congress, jobs
article_metadata.title: President Barack Obama: Congress harms millions of Americans | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
“As I heard from Victor, Mark, Valerie and Becky in Kansas City, there is more work to be done,“ President Barack Obama writes.
“Folks across the country tell me that if Congress just had the same priorities that ordinary Americans did, we could help a lot more families right now.”
